caption: Well organised magic shop with friendly staff and variety of playing cards decks.
Bought snow deck online but had a query that was answered lightening fast. It‚Äôs a great trick explained well with great service from magic Dream :)
One of the best magic shops I have been to in a long time. Even if you don't speak French, you are welcome here. Come by and be impressed.

I am very happy with the service that Magic Dream bring, and this all over the world. They resolve all issue that can come before and after selling. They are a fantastic team through video learning and also from taking time to present all the products. Special thanks to Alexis and Max
Magic Dream is my favorite magic store. The employees are great and very helpful. The products are just awesome and I love the new shop. I wish you all the best for the future. See you soon!

Cozy place for magic meetups, but you need an hour to get served, even when there's only one dude ahead. They'll do magic tricks and all and leave you there waiting. It's hard to endure. Second their prices are hella high. Higher than ebay so be picky. Great card choice, great magic tricks and gimmicks
This is a fantastic magic shop. The staff were extremely helpful and knowledgeable.

I was in Paris  in vacay and i was looking for a shop for magicien as i m a big fan of magic... a friend of mine recommended magic dream to me and it was right in the spot! They have such a HUGE selections of cards, the staff even did some lil tricks in the shop.the staff is super friendly and VERY knowledgeable!!! I love this shop! Will definitely go again!! Merci  Magic Dream :)

Fantastic store with a knowledgable staff, good product selection, and nice patrons.  They had what I was looking for, as well as some advice on something they didn't carry.  Next time I'm in Paris I will definitely be stopping again.

Pro magician shop nestled in the shadow of the Eiffel tower, one the greatest illusions ever! Equipment of all levels available here and there is always a show or two in progress among those there to buy.

Just been there, unfortunately the store was burned down... It was so sad to see all the burned decks around. I‚Äôm writing this as a request of the owner who told me that the store will be closed for some time, but the site is still operating and he will appreciate your support.
A great shop with friendly staff and a massive selection of cards, dvds and other products to buy.  Would 100% recommend to all magic enthusiasts
Magic Dream is the go-to Magic shop of Paris! Excellent customer service, excellent magic, and an overall highly magical experience!! Thanks guys!!
No matter you are new or professional magician, you can find your love in Magic dream. If you are in Paris, don't miss this magic shop!
The best magic shop in Europe- NO DOUBT
As a coin magician, I found the shop expensive and lacking a good supply of materials.

really helpfull staff
Good

Exceptional service, friendly, available and efficient salespeople. Recently, I received a product (of which they were only a distributor) which turned out to be of a quality far below my expectations in addition to having arrived damaged by delivery: We had a constructive exchange. Magic Dream took it back from me for a credit. Thanks to the whole team.

I will say that among all the other Magic stores, Magic Dream is frankly the best, I am proud of this store, so Bravo to all of you, the team. And above all, keep it up Thank you and happy new year To you Th√©o Olivier the Magician
Original store, beautiful presentation of items and demonstration on demand. Smiling, friendly sellers who know the¬†products well. We had a great time in this store! Don't hesitate. Thanks again.

Unfortunately, I have not yet had the opportunity to go to the physical store, living quite far away, but I would like to highlight their responsiveness, their professionalism and their availability to answer questions by email. Being a beginner in the field and having a lot of questions about the many products that tempt me, I have always received good advice and good explanations. Such a service is becoming increasingly rare and deserves to be highlighted... We can clearly feel the team of enthusiasts, keen to share their knowledge. Looking forward to placing my order.

During a visit to Paris, this is the opportunity to come and see your very cool boutique with my son. He was able to see his mentors 'for real' until now only seen on YouTube... Thank you very much for your availability and your demonstrations, it was really nice. Keep going!

A (very) regular customer of the online store, I took advantage of my stay in Paris to finally discover this store in real life. Very nice shop, good advice from Clarisse followed by a very good discussion with Max that I only had by phone. I highly recommend for all magicians (amateurs or not).

Great shop really, I'm not the most interested in magic but the passion of the seller made me want to take an interest in it. Then he does demonstrations etc. it‚Äôs really great I recommend a thousand times

Not serious, I call to find out if they have a large size close up carpet from the ttc brand left, they tell me yes. On the site it is in stock and in 2 colors, I travel, drive an hour and 15 minutes there and as much on the way back for nothing. When I arrive there as if by a miracle they have sold all their stock of all the colors but on their site, you can go and see it is still miraculously in stock!!!!  It's what we call "magic" and a big waste of time. On the other hand, they will never see me again and will give them free publicity. So I'm going to order it from the little magician where we receive it in 48 hours by colissimo and without any problem.  Hello, I have just read your response which is misleading if not dishonest but hardly surprises me and reassures me in my reasoning. First of all, in no case did I insult or molest your partner, but indeed I was angry and left without saying anything, without any goodbye or thanks. As a reminder, I called you on Saturday at 5:16 p.m. from my cell phone while you closed at 6:30 p.m. and arrived at your home almost at opening Tuesday, knowing that you are closed on Sunday and Monday. I would like to believe you that in an hour and thirty minutes, a crowd of magicians rushed into your establishment and robbed you of your large close up excellence carpets, but you won't make anyone believe it. I see that you are reactive when you are unhappy with a review but much less so in updating your website, even today you advertise your large size rugs in stock, which is also in two colors. Updating your site will surely prevent people like me from wasting hours in Paris traffic jams. It is not difficult as you say so well, to improve better service, just be sincere and tell the truth about your stock, perhaps he thought he had some and did not check, that I can imagine it. If you want proof, the cell phone remembers phone call times and it was 5:16 p.m. on Saturday. Send me a phone number and I will send you a screen shot if you wish to prove it to you. That said, I ordered the equipment elsewhere and no longer need your excellent services.

MagicDream is not a magic shop... no... MagicDream is much more than that. MagicDream is a passionate team who will welcome you and support you in the choice of your products and in your development as a magician with professionalism and kindness. MagicDream is incredible products, always relevant advice, simple and complete explanatory videos... MagicDream is a convention in March where the biggest beginners rub shoulders with the biggest stars, in a friendly spirit and exchange. MagicDream made me rediscover magic. A HUGE THANK YOU to the entire team for everything you bring to magic; I look forward to seeing you again in March (badge number 8, I arrived too late for 1 ;-). Disclaimer: I have no connection with MagicDream and purchase all my products at normal price. This comment accurately reflects my thoughts.

Magic trick of the washing machine which comes out with bubbles no longer working after 3 services, and a sword also defective, it had been a little bent... and no refund possible because I placed the order ago several months (I kept these towers for the Christmas period) VERY DISAPPOINTED And goodbye forever...

Great welcome in this store, a first for my son who is starting to be interested in magic, the boys gave him lots of advice, showed him tricks and therefore the desire to do more. We left delighted with tours in our pockets. I strongly recommend. Thanks again. üëç

I come from the Vosges, I order a lot online and I was lucky enough to get there with a wonderful welcome from Max. Max was very professional and did not force the purchase but gave a very nice demonstration of magic which made us want to buy. The shop was very clean and super tidy, I highly recommend!

Really disappointed. I order the Tetracube for ‚Ç¨170!  3 weeks later the cube is stuck and becomes unusable. A joint in the center has been released. I am told that the poor assembly of the "flap" is surely the cause or incorrect use!!!! No written documentation or explanation on mounting the flaps... a video with NO commentary on the subject. Deal with that. I am told that they made a commercial gesture by changing the cube for me. I think we are more on the European law of the 2 year legal guarantee! I receive the cube in exchange.  A few manipulations from one hand to the other, nothing more and after 15 days a defect appears again on the second cube. This time the adhesive twists.... There I am told that with my use and even if it falls on the ground cannot achieve this result.... But they are unable to tell me why this defect happens!!!! The cube is obviously not the cause..... I am certainly using it incorrectly...  But for professionals it is not professional not to be able to explain, except to say ‚Äúmisuse‚Äù  In any case there is a real quality problem with this product... or recommendations to be expected. I ask for a refund or credit... and I even offer a credit by returning the cube and thus offer to buy on the site for the amount of the credit. I am returning the cube because I do not want to work with a product that seems to have so many defects (2 in 2 months). And so they can investigate the faulty cube for improvement.  To date, no refund, no credit, nor even an echo indicating that they had understood the source of the problem.  But we are collecting orders... Very good relationship before placing orders, but less motivated afterwards!  By talking by telephone with the inventor of the Tetracube, we learn a lot and understand the current situation better...  I go my way Damage.  Nota Bene: The selling price set by the inventor was $100 Canadian (~‚Ç¨70). What justifies the sale price of 170‚Ç¨????!!!!
Very good advice and very friendly seller! Thank you very much Dylan, I will come back

Too many disappointments. Tours more expensive than in other stores. Constant advertisements on the website (requests for notifications, addition to the wish list, etc., non-stop...). It sells anything and everything, the teasers are sometimes misleading... That's a lot!
